release_notes.en-US:
Bug fixes
  • Fix address completion issue with Cardbook add-on for Thunderbird 68
  • Fix compatibility issue with Conversations add-on
  • Fix Mail Redirect toolbar display and customization for Thunderbird 70.0a1
See also the release notes for version 0.10.4.

release_notes.en-US:
Bug fixes
  • Change background color of notification for failed messages
  • Restore Redirect menuitem in Application menu for Thunderbird 68
  • Fix issue with unpacking redirect window icon in Thunderbird 68
  • Fix multi message display of Redirect button for Thunderbird 68
  • Fix alignment of concurrent connections and default recipients in preferences
  • Fix placing of Redirect in in-content options for Thunderbird 70.0a1
See also the release notes for version 0.10.3.

release_notes.en-US:
New
  • Add Mail Redirect Options to Thunderbird's Options
  • Add Croatian localization
    • Bug fixes
    • Fix styling issues in Redirect window
    • Fix layout of addressing area of Mail Redirect window for SeaMonkey
    • Fix Close and Exit functions of Mail Redirect window for SeaMonkey
    • Made Resent-User-Agent optional (not sent by default)
    • Change encoding of errorconsole.txt to UTF-8
    See also the release notes for version 0.10.2.

release_notes.en-US:
Bug fixes
  • Fix bug with drag & drop to redirect window in Thunderbird 64+
  • Fix bug with unwanted styling of folder pane in Thunderbird 65+
See also the release notes for version 0.10.1.

release_notes.en-US:
Bug fixes
  • Fix bug where Ctrl+L keyboard shortcut to forward a message stopped working
See also the release notes for version 0.10.

release_notes.en-US:
New
  • Option to add Redirect to Forward As menu items and buttons
Bug fixes
  • Better support for Light and Dark themes
  • Better integration with CardBook add-on with relation to contacts sidebar
  • Code changes to stay compatible with Thunderbird 65.0a1
  • Fix issue where contents of error console couldn't be sent via email
Known issues
  • Sometimes after sending a message or replying to a message, the redirect button and menuitems become disabled. The workaround is to select another message and then the redirect button and menuitems become available again.
  • The progressmeter on the individual messages that are being resent is missing. This type of progressmeter is removed in Thunderbird 60. The overall progressmeter in the statusbar still works.

release_notes.en-US:
Bug fixes
  • Fix issue where some messages couldn't be redirected in Thunderbird 60.0
  • Fix issue where redirect window doesn't have its own icon in Thunderbird 60.0, because the add-on isn't unpacked anymore
  • Fix issue where error console couldn't be saved to file
  • Fix layout of addressing area of Mail Redirect window
  • Fix issue where redirect icon isn't visible in customization window for the message toolbar in Thunderbird 60.0 under Linux
See also the release notes for version 0.9.6.

release_notes.en-US:
Bug fixes
  • Fix styling of Mail Redirect window
  • Restore date format settings for Thunderbird 57.0b3
  • Add delete button to remove recipients from Mail Redirect window
  • Add Bulgarian localization
See also the release notes for version 0.9.5.

release_notes.en-US:
Bug Fixes
  • Use Photon style icon to match theming of Thunderbird 59.0a1
  • Restore the option to customize toolbars for Thunderbird 59.0a1
  • Restore options screen for Thunderbird 59.0a1
  • Restore date format settings for Thunderbird 59.0a1
  • Add Arabic localization
See also the release notes for version 0.9.4.

release_notes.en-US:
Bug Fixes
  • Use new SVG-format for toolbar icons to stay compatible with Thunderbird 58.0a1
  • Change options to open in a tab for Thunderbird 59.0a1
  • Fix Mail Redirect preferences pane for SeaMonkey
  • Add Indonesian localization
See also the release notes for version 0.9.3.

release_notes.en-US:
Bug Fixes
  • Fix bug with contextmenu menuitem being showed when it shouldn't
  • Simplify the layout of the prefs windows
  • Add Lithuanian localization
  • Change handling of default preferences for Thunderbird 58.0a1
See also the release notes for version 0.9.2.

release_notes.en-US:
Bug Fixes
  • Fix drag&drop function of messages on Mail Redirect window
  • Add missing colon for button labels in Contacts Sidebar
  • Use date format display settings to show dates in Mail Redirect window
  • Remove STEEL uses
See also the release notes for version 0.9.1.

release_notes.en-US:
Bug fixes
  • Fix use of for..each for Thunderbird 55.0a1
  • Fix styling of buttons for Thunderbird 45 for Windows, Linux and Mac
  • Fix issue where redirect button is removed instead of disabled after replying to a message
  • Readd More button to default set of buttons on message header pane
  • Make add-on name in add-ons manager localizable
  • Add Greek, Finnish, Hungarian and Norwegian localization
Known issues
  • Sometimes after sending a message or replying to a message, the redirect button and menuitems become disabled. The workaround is to select another message and then the redirect button and menuitems become available again.
See also the release notes for version 0.8.9.

release_notes.en-US:
Bug Fixes
  • Change position of Delete and Properties items in the context menu of Address Book and contacts sidebar for Thunderbird 50.0a2
  • Improved definitions of string shims
  • Improved compatibility with CardBook add-on
  • Add Ukrainian, Portuguese and Spanish (Mexico) localization (It's true!)
See also the release notes for version 0.8.8.

release_notes.en-US:
Bug Fixes
  • Fix error in addressing widget for Thunderbird 46.0a2
  • Fix bug in error message when no recipients have been specified for Thunderbird 38
  • Fix bug in error messages for recipients for SeaMonkey
  • Fix backwards compatibility with older versions of Thunderbird
  • Use method includes() instead of contains()
  • Various performance improvements to addressing widget
  • Add compatibility with CardBook add-on
  • Add Catalan localization
See also the release notes for version 0.8.7.

Bug Fixes
  • Fix error in multimessageview for Thunderbird 38
  • Fix enabling of the Redirect button in the Redirect window
  • Fix error with Redirect button not showing in message header pane for Thunderbird 38 on Windows XP
  • Add Slovenian localization
See also the release notes for version 0.8.5.

release_notes.en-US:
Bug Fixes
  • Fix redeclaration of let variable
  • Fix autocompletion of addresses for SeaMonkey 2.30
  • Add full screen button to redirect window on mac OS X
  • Add styling for other platforms like Solaris and BSD
  • Remove unused code
See also the release notes for version 0.8.4 and version 0.8.

release_notes.en-US:
Bug Fixes
  • Fix bug with redirect button being disabled in new redirect window with default recipients
  • Fix styling error with message header area of mail redirect window being hard to read on Ubuntu
  • Fix for displaying button in multimessage conversation view
See also the release notes for version 0.8.3 and version 0.8.

release_notes.en-US:
Bug Fixes
  • Fix bug with autocompletion of addresses in Thunderbird 31
  • Fix bug with part of status bar not being shown in Thunderbird 24.6 on Mac OS X
  • Fix bug with commas in display names of email addresses
  • Fix for displaying button in multimessage conversation view
  • Fix typo preventing saving of the error console
  • Better integration with Compact Header add-on
See also the release notes for version 0.8.

text.en-US: This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.

release_notes.en-US:
• Add default recipient type to more easily redirect using Resend-Cc or Resend-Bcc
  • Change next recipient type according to last default recipient
  • Add subject of first redirected message to window title
  • Add Contacts Sidebar to Mail Redirect window
  • Add drag and drop and delete support for messages
  • Add feature to send contents of Error Console via email
  • Increase maximum header length to 32768 bytes
  • Fix autocomplete of addresses for Thunderbird 28+
  • Make the redirect addressing widget resizable
  • Disable all UI elements while a message is being sent
  • Fix bug with sending sensitive information from wrapped header lines
  • Fix bug with disabling Mail Redirect button when switching folders
  • Fix bug with unopened Ubuntu One address books
  • Fix bug with encoding non-ascii sender and recipient names
  • Add Danish, Turkish, Chinese (Traditional), Albanian and Serbian localization

text.en-US: This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.

release_notes.en-US:
• Change From to Resend-From in Redirect window to prevent ambiguities with wrong From address in bounced mails
  • Fix bug with using mailing lists from a secondary address book
  • Fix bug with from address not being selected in some cases
  • Fix bug with long resent-headers not being wrapped according to RFC 2047
  • Fix styling error which resulted in a not displaying message list in combination with MicroThunderbird theme
  • Add Redirect button to multimessage conversation view
  • Add Resent-To: undisclosed-recipients:; header when redirecting only as bcc
  • Restore default update mechanism using addons.mozilla.org
  • Restore options and icon in add-on's configuration file

text.en-US: This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.

release_notes.en-US:
• Change code to stay compatible with Thunderbird 20 and SeaMonkey 2.17
  • Change function to save console to support Gecko 17
  • Re-add preferences screen for SeaMonkey
  • Restore throbber for Thunderbird
  • Add styling for SeaMonkey Classic/Modern
  • Add possibility to customize redirect window toolbars
  • Change order of options in preference screen
  • Change accesskey for Address Book
  • Add redirect button to message header pane
  • Add localized description
  • Add ja and zh-CN translation
  • Remove Postbox support (Postbox 2.5 has mailredirect built in)

- EXPERIMENTAL: icon in subjectCol indicating redirected messages (iconset only for
  thunderbird). currently doesn't work with IMAP accounts.
- maxVersion changed to 1.5.0.*
